!Trader Espen: Unfortunately, Muska made a bad choice when he fell in love with Fatima. Her heart concealed dark tendencies... While her lover was risking his life stealing treasure, she had already found herself a lover in Heine, and was plotting to betray Muska... When Muska returned to her after hiding the treasure somewhere, Fatima gave him poison and he died. [Quest _383_SearchingForTreasure 30890-06.htm|"Continue to listen to the story."]
